ModMetaData.name: Mr Samuel Streamer's Custom Faction
ModMetaData.author: D4egon, Mr Samuel Streamer
ModMetaData.description: Don't download this unless you're using one of my mod packs! A custom faction mod to add my patrons into Rimworld in the form of imprisonable, harmable, torturable, friends. This is just a basic foundation faction that will allow me to customise, expand, and theme on a modpack-by-modpack basis. By itself it's just another regular faction!
